question:
You have a friend who lives in a city abroad. You have decided that you would like to apply to do a course at one of the colleges in this city.
Write a letter to your friend. In the letter
explain what you would like to do
explain what kind of work or studies you have been doing for the past few years
ask for assistance in contacting an appropriate institution
text: Hope you are doing well, it is a long time since we didn’t meet each other since you moved to the United State of America. I am writing this letter to inform you that I am also planning to study abroad for better career opportunities. I will really appreciate it if you can help me to select the university for my course.

As you know, I completed my Bachelor of Commerce in 2018 with an excellent GPA, Afterward I did a one-year diploma in Finance in the year 2019 along with International business management at the University of Lavanya. Right now, I am planning to go for an accounting course in the USA. And I have already selected some of the institutions in New York City where you are residing for the last 1 year.

It will really great help if you can directly contact all of these institutions for one year of accounting diploma and assist me to get admission to the college. I will really appreciate your efforts.
